pages.text: $(br) Makes entities aggressive. $(br) To use this power, you must pull allomantically while looking at the entity.$(br)$(br)$(br) Bonus: $(br) - You can free pets from their owner.

pages.title: Interactions
pages.text: $(br) + Duralumin: Strengthens the entity. $(br2) + Lerasium: Apply the effect in area. $(br2) + Ambos: Strengthens entities in area.
